CustomField.description: Disposition is used for calculating win rates. It forces labels open opportunites aged >365 days into "Old - No Decsision".
CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordTypeId, "01250000000Hd58", "Renewal", "01250000000HdeD", "Adjustment", "01250000000Hq3W", "Cancellation", IF( IsClosed, CASE(StageName, "Closed Won", "Closed Won", "Closed Lost", "Closed Lost", "Closed - No Decision", "Closed - No Decision", "Other Closed" ), IF( Opportunity_Age__c > 365, "Old - No Decision", IF( Probability < 0.35, "Needs Business Case", IF( Probability <1.0, "Shopping for a Solution", "Probability Unknown" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Disposition is used for calculating win rates. It forces labels open opportunites aged >365 days into "Old - No Decsision".
CustomField.label: Disposition
